reviews.customers_say: Customers love this classic Irish wool sweater for its beautiful cable knit design and emerald green color. They find it warm, cozy, and well-made, with one customer noting it cuts through morning chill. While the fit is great, customers mention it runs a bit large.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars ain't nothing like the real thing, baby
items.body: My wife has learned what everyone should- natural fibers are just better, in every way. She's learned to love good wool, as well as cotton and linen, good leather and fur. Like many, she must wear another layer 'twixt her tender skin and wool, but wool is warm, even in damp weather, looks great and lasts really long. I'd imagine the time will come when one of our grandaughters will be happy to inherit this timeless sweater, and it will look great on her, too. Get the good stuff, take care of it, and it'll take care of you. Read more
items.author: hacklewrap

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic company and sweater! Not heavyweight wool yarn, so good year-round.
items.body: Many visitors to California's central coast are surprised to find how cold it gets here year-round mornings & evenings. I wear a cardigan pretty much every day. Prior to this purchase on Amazon, I've bought a few merino wool Irish sweaters from a well known TV shopping network at much higher prices. I'm thrilled with my recent purchase of this Carraig Donn A Line Aran Knit Cardigan. Ordered on the 15th of April, it arrived from Ireland today... the 21st! The purple color is lovely and just as shown on its product page. New, out of the package, it seemed somewhat small for a large, but knits often are; the knit will loosen somewhat with wear. The yarn isn't as beefy as other Irish sweaters I've purchased in the past. That's good for two reasons: first, it won't be too hot in warmer weather (40-60 degrees), and secondly, it won't make you look 10-15 pound heavier layered over a long sleeved shirt or turtleneck in winter. The a line shape is flattering. It seems to be well made. As with all wool sweaters, you'll want to air it for a few days before wearing or storing. I've been told to always store sweaters like this in a drawer. The company included a nice note and a tote bag with my purchase, as well as a small catalog of their other offerings. Very happy! Read more
items.author: E. M. Griffith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classic Irish Wool, it is perfect!
items.body: Exactly what I’ve been looking for! This is the classic Irish wool sweater that I’ve been wanting for years. Decided on this birthday to treat myself and found this sweater on Amazon was priced better than on other sites. It is warm, and so pretty! The buttons slip through small openings, the button holes are not stitched which is great because when wearing it unbuttoned it looks perfect, no big button holes standing out. If they had the raspberry color that I saw on another site I would buy it again. Read more
items.author: reesecat

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars A green sad sack...
items.body: I have 3 other Irish cardigans that are beautifully crafted, well-made and warm. Unfortunately this one (size XS) is a big disappointment and I returned it. The knit is so loose, when putting the sweater on it stretches out making holes (!) in the pattern and compromises any styling. The sleeves are enormous and way out of proportion. The green color is much lighter than shown. Instead of a rich green, it is washed out and unremarkable. The buttons are large and in a brown wood instead of matching green as shown. Buyer beware. Read more
items.author: Petit lady

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a beautiful sweater that fits very nicely
items.body: It's a beautiful sweater that fits very nicely. The color I chose is a lovely shade of blue. It has a flare and it is nice and long and covers to my derrière. It is also comfy and warm. Read more
items.author: Desperate in Conneticut

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Look I found the Luck of the handmade Irish sweaters, don't pass it up, it will last a lifetime.
items.body: You Irish, or do you just like a soft, gorgeous handmade sweater right from Ireland. The absolute best quality, and so Kozy for any occasion, Foliage season, winter, or a Kozy fire at home, I'm shocked I found it, it's truly an amazing and great investment. No washer or dryer, very easy to wash, and dries within hours. I bought one for my cousin, being in California, she gets plenty of use, cause it can be used for those warm or those cool evenings. Read more
items.author: Norwaygirl

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Husband thinks this made me look dumpy
items.body: I loved the color, the texture, the weave, and the feel of this sweater. When I modeled for my husband, he said, "it makes you look dumpy. It's big and bulky." I am 5 ft and 110 pounds. I liked the idea of being surrounded by a nice, warm, woolen sweater. But I don't want to appear to be wearing a lumber jack outfit at happy hour. Sorry, the weave is great, buttons are great, and if it were just me and my cat, I'd keep it. The collar is especially nice if you want to wear it with a turtleneck. Sorry, sorry. It's a beautiful sweater. Read more
items.author: Pathfinder

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT 3 SEASON SWEATER
items.author: Brutabobm

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Natural, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
